verses.text: \w As|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s fellow workers, \w then|strong="G2532"\w*, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w urge|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w favor|strong="G1184"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G1873"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* helped \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.” \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w is|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w favor|strong="G1184"\w*; \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w is|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*!

\w We|strong="G2443"\w* \w put|strong="G1325"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* obstacle \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3367"\w*’s \w way|strong="G1722"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w one|strong="G3367"\w* \w can|strong="G1325"\w* \w discredit|strong="G3469"\w* \w our|strong="G1722"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*.

Rather, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w servants|strong="G1249"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w we|strong="G5613"\w* \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w way|strong="G1722"\w*: \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w endurance|strong="G5281"\w*; \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w troubles|strong="G2347"\w*, hardships, \w and|strong="G2316"\w* calamities;

\w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w beatings|strong="G4127"\w*, \w imprisonments|strong="G5438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2873"\w* riots; \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w labor|strong="G2873"\w*, sleepless nights, \w and|strong="G2873"\w* \w hunger|strong="G3521"\w*;

\w in|strong="G1722"\w* purity, \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w patience|strong="G3115"\w*, \w and|strong="G4151"\w* \w kindness|strong="G5544"\w*; \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* sincere love;

\w in|strong="G1722"\w* truthful \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w weapons|strong="G3696"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* left;

\w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* dishonor, \w slander|strong="G1426"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w praise|strong="G1391"\w*; viewed \w as|strong="G5613"\w* imposters, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* genuine;

unknown, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w well-known|strong="G1921"\w*; dying, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w on|strong="G2198"\w*; \w punished|strong="G3811"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w killed|strong="G2289"\w*;

\w sorrowful|strong="G3076"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w always|strong="G3956"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G5463"\w*; \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w making|strong="G4148"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w rich|strong="G4148"\w*; \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w possessing|strong="G2722"\w* \w everything|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* spoken freely \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w Corinthians|strong="G2881"\w*. \w Our|strong="G4314"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w open|strong="G4115"\w* \w wide|strong="G4115"\w*.

\w It|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w our|strong="G1722"\w* \w affection|strong="G4698"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w yours|strong="G4771"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w restrained|strong="G4729"\w*.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w fair|strong="G2532"\w* exchange—\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3588"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*—\w open|strong="G4115"\w* \w wide|strong="G4115"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* hearts \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Do|strong="G5101"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* unequally yoked \w with|strong="G4314"\w* unbelievers. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w partnership|strong="G3352"\w* \w can|strong="G1063"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* wickedness? \w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* \w does|strong="G5101"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*?

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w harmony|strong="G4857"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w between|strong="G4314"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* Belial? \w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w does|strong="G5101"\w* \w a|strong="G2228"\w* \w believer|strong="G4103"\w* \w have|strong="G5101"\w* \w in|strong="G4314"\w* \w common|strong="G3310"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w an|strong="G2228"\w* unbeliever?

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w agreement|strong="G4783"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w exist|strong="G1510"\w* \w between|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*? \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w dwell|strong="G1774"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G1704"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w My|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.”

“\w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w come|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w among|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G3004"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* separate, \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. Touch \w no|strong="G3361"\w* unclean \w thing|strong="G3004"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G1352"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.”

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*: “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w My|strong="G1473"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w daughters|strong="G2364"\w*, \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*.”
